name: Rollercoaster Dash - Rush and Jump the Train!
name_original: Rollercoaster Dash - Rush and Jump the Train!
description:
What a rush! Can you guide your train down a treacherous roller coaster track at breakneck speeds?

You'll be having a ball in no time, avoiding obstacles and jumping over massive gaps to get the high score!

Compete against your friends to see whose train can get the furthest! This game is not just for kids!

Adrenaline rush guaranteed!

Install now to enjoy this amazing racer brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
